kitronik_simple_servo: Blocks for driving the Kitronik Simple Servo Control Board
kitronik_simple_servo.ServoChoice: Selection of the servo to drive
kitronik_simple_servo.ServoDirection: Selection of direction to turn for continuous servos
kitronik_simple_servo.servoRunPercentage: For a continuous rotation servo, set the rotation direction and the percentage speed (0 to 100%)
is the choice direction for the servo to move either clockwise or counter-clockwise
is the percentage of speed between neutral position and full end point
is the selection of the servo to control
kitronik_simple_servo.servoStop|param|se: is the selection of the servo to control
kitronik_simple_servo.setServoAngle: Turn the selected servo to the angle set in degrees
kitronik_simple_servo.setServoAngle|para: is the position which the servo is set to
is the selection of the servo to control
kitronik_simple_servo.setServoNeutral: Turn the selected servo back to a neutral position at 90 degrees
kitronik_simple_servo.setServoNeutral|pa: is the selection of the servo to control
